question: What are the names of projects that are related to disaster and have a start date later than 2022? Only list the names of these projects
sub_query: What are the names of projects that are related to disaster and have a start date later than 2022? Only list the names of these projects
final_answer: The project related to disaster with a start date later than 2022 is "Outdoor Warning Sirens - Design".
